alert.note: Alert for Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 12 at 3:11PM CDT until April 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WINONA...SOUTHEASTERN BUFFALO...SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON AND TREMPEALEAU COUNTIES... At 310 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arcadia, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported 1 inch in Rollingstone, MN at 258pm and Winona, MN at 310 pm. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Blair around 325 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Franklin, Czechville, Merrick State Park, Lock And Dam 5 A, Camp Decorah, Dodge and Beach Corners. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 247 and 256. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
